meanings.sent1: I love to eat maters in my salad.
meanings.sent2: The maters in the garden are ripe and ready to be picked.
meanings.sent3: Why did the tomato blush? Because it saw the maters ketchup!
meanings.sent4: The bright red maters in the grocery store looked like little jewels.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh maters always reminds me of summer.

meanings.definition: A slang term for friends or companions.
meanings.sent1: My maters and I are going to the movies tonight.
meanings.sent2: I can always count on my maters for support.
meanings.sent3: Why did the maters go to school together? Because they wanted to ketchup on things!
meanings.sent4: Even though they argued, their bond as maters was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The group of maters laughed together until their stomachs hurt.
